job_description: We are seeking dedicated individuals to join our frontline operation team. Responsibilities include waste collection, sorting, and ensuring proper disposal procedures are followed. The ideal candidate should have strong communication skills, attention to detail, and the ability to work in a fast-paced environment.
requirements: Ability to lift heavy objects and work outdoors in various weather conditions
Experience in waste management or related field is a plus

job_description: We are looking for skilled equipment operators to manage our machinery and ensure efficient waste processing operations. Responsibilities include operating compactors, balers, and other equipment, performing routine maintenance checks, and adhering to safety protocols.
requirements: Knowledge of safety regulations and procedures

job_description: We are seeking experienced dump truck drivers to transport waste materials to designated disposal sites. Responsibilities include loading, transporting, and unloading materials safely and efficiently, conducting pre-trip and post-trip inspections, and maintaining accurate records.
requirements: Valid commercial driver's license (CDL) with clean driving record
Experience operating dump trucks or similar heavy vehicles
Ability to work independently and follow instructions
